explains: adj. 无家可归的；位移的；被取代的
v. 取代（displace 的过去分词）；移动……的位置；撤换
wordGroup: displaced person n. 难民；因战争（或政治迫害）逃离家园的人

sentences.en: Gradually factory workers have been displaced by machines.
sentences.cn: 工厂的工人已逐渐被机器取代。

sentences.en: There is an urgent need for food and shelter for these displaced people.
sentences.cn: 急需为这些难民提供食物和住处。

sentences.en: These factories have displaced tourism as the country's largest source of foreign exchange.
sentences.cn: 这些工厂已经取代了旅游业而成为该国最大的外汇来源。
